author: drkovalskyi
body:
#### PR description:
- New GEN filter based on MCMultiParticleFilter implementing filtering on multiple signatures
- Needed for Inclusive MC production for BPH. For details see: <https://indico.cern.ch/event/1282524/contributions/5388383/attachments/2643735/4575670/2023-05-09%20Inclusive%20MC%20for%20Charm%20and%20B-Physics.pdf>
- Will need to be back ported to CMSSW_12_4 for production

#### PR validation:

- The code was validated for physics and behaves as expected in CMSSW_12_4. 
- No changes beside formatting were introduced after validation
title: Multi signature gen filter
